channel.title: 1234's server package in a batch file V1.4!
channel.description:
[size=15pt][b]1234's server package in a batch file V1.4![/b][/size]
Features in [b]V1.4[/b] : - Q ~ To delete all class files *WARNING - G ~ To see the credits - Z ~ To convert the server to Jar archive ( Not tested ) - L ~ To compile your server ( Not tested ) - S ~ To make a new runserver ( run.bat ) - C ~ To make a new shop ( shops2.cfg ) - R ~ To run your server - E ~ To exit this file - J ~ To run Client.java ( under construction ) - A ~ To make a new autospawn ( autospawn2.cfg ) - D ~ To delete all character files - P ~ To start the command maker
[b]V1.4 : [/b] First, open up notepad. Paste this code in it : [code]@echo off if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86) set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01 set jac=\bin\javac.exe set jav=\bin\java.exe :menu title 1234's All-in-one V1.4 echo Hello and thank you for using 1234's All-in-1 V1.4 that was made from scratch echo Choose your option below : echo. echo Q - To delete your class files *WARNING echo G - To see the credits echo Z - To convert the server to Jar archive echo L - To compile your server echo S - To make a new runserver ( run.bat ) echo C - To make a new shop ( shops2.cfg ) echo R - To run your server echo E - To exit this file echo J - To run Client.java ( under construction ) echo A - To make a new autospawn ( autospawn2.cfg ) echo D - To delete all character files echo P - To start the command maker echo. set /p c=Option ? if %c%==Q goto 1 if %c%==q goto 1 if %c%==P goto 2 if %c%==p goto 2 if %c%==G goto 8 if %c%==g goto 8 if %c%==Z goto jar if %c%==z goto jar if %c%==L goto c if %c%==l goto c if %c%==D goto del if %c%==d goto del if %c%==S goto rock if %c%==s goto rock if %c%==C goto shops2 if %c%==c goto shops2 if %c%==R goto runserver if %c%==r goto runserver if %c%==E goto exit if %c%==e goto exit if %c%==J goto java if %c%==j goto java if %c%==a goto file if %c%==A goto file pause cls :1 cls title Confirmation echo Are you sure you want to delete your class files?This may never echo let you run your server again. (yes/no) echo. set /p c=Y or N? if %c%==y goto 6 if %c%==Y goto 6 if %c%==n goto menu if %c%==N goto menu :6 cls title Delete class files echo Class files are deleting... echo. if exist *.class (del *.class) echo Process done. pause cls goto menu :2 cls title Command Maker echo Please note that this command maker will echo make a folder in your server file called echo 'commands'.Inside the folder echo will be your commands.You can manually echo add the commands by copying and pasting them echo into your client.java. echo Thank you. echo. echo. Set /p CmdName=Command Name? Set /p RUSure=Are You Sure To Give It the Name %CmdName%(y,n)? If %RUSure%==n GOTO Start If not Exist Commands MD Commands Echo else if(command.equalsignorecase("%CmdName%")) >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo { >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" set /p AY=addItem(y,n)? If %AY%==Y Goto addItem If %AY%==y Goto addItem If %AY%==n Goto endCode If %AY%==Y Goto endCode :addItem cls set /p ID=ItemID? set /p Amount=Amount Of that Item? echo addItem(%ID%,%Amount%); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Set /P AT=addItem Or Tele(not Used In Same Command Usually(AI,T,End) If %AT%==ai GOTO addItem If %AT%==Ai GOTO addItem If %AT%==AI GOTO addItem If %AT%==aI GOTO addItem If %AT%==T GOTO Tele If %AT%==t GOTO Tele If %AT%==end GOTO endCode If %AT%==END GOTO endCode If %AT%==EnD GOTO endCode If %AT%==eNd GOTO endCode If %AT%==ENd GOTO endCode If %AT%==enD GOTO endCode if %AT%==End Goto endcode
:endCode cls Echo } >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Set /p Again=Make Another? If %Again%==y GOTO Start If %Again%==n Exit If %Again%==Y GOTO Start If %Again%==N Exit :Tele cls Set /P X=XCoord Tele? Set /P Y=YCoord Tele? Echo teleportToX = %X% >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo teleportToY = %Y% >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Set /P AT=addItem Or Another Tele(not Used In Same Command Usually(AI,T,End) If %AT%==ai GOTO addItem If %AT%==Ai GOTO addItem If %AT%==AI GOTO addItem If %AT%==aI GOTO addItem If %AT%==T GOTO Tele If %AT%==t GOTO Tele If %AT%==end GOTO endCode If %AT%==END GOTO endCode If %AT%==EnD GOTO endCode If %AT%==eNd GOTO endCode If %AT%==ENd GOTO endCode If %AT%==enD GOTO endCode if %AT%==End Goto endcode :8 cls title Credits echo Hello and thank you for using this batch file echo based program. echo. echo Here are the real credits : echo Frell ( Batch IDE, helped me a bit ) echo 1234ideclareathumbwar ( Me =D ) echo Legend Rene ( I don't know why? *Actually he echo kept me company while making it. ) echo. pause cls goto menu cls :jar cls title Jar convert echo This will now convert your class files into an echo executable Jar archive. echo. jar cf Server.jar *.class echo. echo Process done. echo. pause cls :c cls title Compiler goto cjc :c2 %javac% -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/*.java echo. echo This compiler is based on Mod Taharok's compiler echo It can be found in other server folders. echo. pause exit :cjc if exist "%pro%_06%jac%" (goto sjc) else (goto cjc2) :cjc2 if exist "%pro%_07%jac%" (goto sjc2) else (goto cjc3) :cjc3 if exist "%pro%_08%jac%" (goto sjc3) else (goto cjc4) :cjc4 if exist "%pro%_09%jac%" (goto sjc4) else (goto cjc5) :cjc5 if exist "%pro%_10%jac%" (goto sjc5) else (goto cjc6) :cjc6 if exist "%pro2%%jac%" (goto sjc6) else (goto cjc7) :cjc7 if exist "%pro%%jac%" (goto sjc7) else (goto cjc8) :cjc8 if exist "%pro%_01%jac%" (goto sjc8) else (goto cjc9) :cjc9 if exist "%pro%_02%jac%" (goto sjc9) else (goto cjc10) :cjc10 if exist "%pro%_03%jac%" (goto sjc10) else (goto cjc11) :cjc11 if exist "%pro%_04%jac%" (goto sjc11) else (goto cjc12) :cjc12 if exist "%pro%_05%jac%" (goto sjc12) else (goto je) :sjc set javac="%pro%_06%jac%" goto c2 :sjc2 set javac="%pro%_07%jac%" goto c2 :sjc3 set javac="%pro%_08%jac%" goto c2 :sjc4 set javac="%pro%_09%jac%" goto c2 :sjc5 set javac="%pro%_10%jac%" goto c2 :sjc6 set javac="%pro2%%jac%" goto c2 :sjc7 set javac="%pro%%jac%" goto c2 :sjc8 set javac="%pro%_01%jac%" goto c2 :sjc9 set javac="%pro%_02%jac%" goto c2 :sjc10 set javac="%pro%_03%jac%" goto c2 :sjc11 set javac="%pro%_04%jac%" goto c2 :sjc12 set javac="%pro%_05%jac%" goto c2 :cl cls goto c5 :je echo You don't have Java installed on this computer echo Get it at java.sun.com pause cls :del cls del /F /S /Q characters del /F /S /Q connectedfrom del /F /S /Q moreinfo echo All characters have been deleted echo successfully. pause cls goto menu :rock cls echo. >>"run.bat" echo Run.bat has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. echo. pause cls goto menu :shops2 cls echo. >>"shops2.cfg" echo. [ Shops2 by 1234 ] >>"shops2.cfg" echo The file has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. :runserver cls title Runserver echo Loading server.... echo. java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server cls echo. pause cls goto menu :file cls echo. >>"autospawn2.cfg" echo. [ Autospawn2 by 1234 ] >>"autospawn2.cfg" echo The file has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. pause cls goto menu :java cls echo client.java is loading.. java -cp .client cls goto menu pause cls :exit cls title exit echo Thank you for at least using 1234's all-in-one program. echo V1.6 is coming soon, stay tuned! pause cls goto lol :lol This section will close the file.[/code]
Then save as whatever file name you want then .bat. EG [code]Package.bat[/code] When saving, the box below MUST be saying something like this [code]Save As : All types *.*[/code] Just something like that.
Features in [b]V1.2[/b] : - Adds autospawn2.cfg - Adds shops2.cfg - Compiles your server ( Not tested ) - Runs your server - Deletes all character files - Adds a new runserver.bat - Convert your class files into a .jar archive - Added credits - Runs client.java ( Not tested )
[b]V1.2 :[/b] First, open up notepad. Paste this code in it : [code]@echo off if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86) set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01 set jac=\bin\javac.exe set jav=\bin\java.exe :menu title 1234's All-in-one V1.2 echo Hello and thank you for using 1234's All-in-1 V1.2 that was made from scratch echo Choose your option below : echo. echo G - To see the credits echo Z - To convert the server to Jar archive echo L - To compile your server echo S - To make a new runserver ( run.bat ) echo C - To make a new shop ( shops2.cfg ) echo R - To run your server echo E - To exit this file echo J - To run Client.java ( under construction ) echo A - To make a new autospawn ( autospawn2.cfg ) echo D - To delete all character files echo. set /p c=Option ? if %c%==G goto 8 if %c%==g goto 8 if %c%==Z goto jar if %c%==z goto jar if %c%==L goto c if %c%==l goto c if %c%==D goto del if %c%==d goto del if %c%==S goto rock if %c%==s goto rock if %c%==C goto shops2 if %c%==c goto shops2 if %c%==R goto runserver if %c%==r goto runserver if %c%==E goto exit if %c%==e goto exit if %c%==J goto java if %c%==j goto java if %c%==a goto file if %c%==A goto file pause cls :8 cls title Credits echo Hello and thank you for using this batch file echo based program. echo. echo Here are the real credits : echo Frell ( Batch IDE, helped me a bit ) echo 1234ideclareathumbwar ( Me =D ) echo Legend Rene ( I don't know why? *Actually he echo kept me company while making it. ) echo. pause cls goto menu cls :jar cls title Jar convert echo This will now convert your class files into an echo executable Jar archive. echo. jar cf Server.jar *.class echo. echo Process done. echo. pause cls :c cls title Compiler goto cjc :c2 %javac% -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/*.java echo. echo This compiler is based on Mod Taharok's compiler echo It can be found in other server folders. echo. pause exit :cjc if exist "%pro%_06%jac%" (goto sjc) else (goto cjc2) :cjc2 if exist "%pro%_07%jac%" (goto sjc2) else (goto cjc3) :cjc3 if exist "%pro%_08%jac%" (goto sjc3) else (goto cjc4) :cjc4 if exist "%pro%_09%jac%" (goto sjc4) else (goto cjc5) :cjc5 if exist "%pro%_10%jac%" (goto sjc5) else (goto cjc6) :cjc6 if exist "%pro2%%jac%" (goto sjc6) else (goto cjc7) :cjc7 if exist "%pro%%jac%" (goto sjc7) else (goto cjc8) :cjc8 if exist "%pro%_01%jac%" (goto sjc8) else (goto cjc9) :cjc9 if exist "%pro%_02%jac%" (goto sjc9) else (goto cjc10) :cjc10 if exist "%pro%_03%jac%" (goto sjc10) else (goto cjc11) :cjc11 if exist "%pro%_04%jac%" (goto sjc11) else (goto cjc12) :cjc12 if exist "%pro%_05%jac%" (goto sjc12) else (goto je) :sjc set javac="%pro%_06%jac%" goto c2 :sjc2 set javac="%pro%_07%jac%" goto c2 :sjc3 set javac="%pro%_08%jac%" goto c2 :sjc4 set javac="%pro%_09%jac%" goto c2 :sjc5 set javac="%pro%_10%jac%" goto c2 :sjc6 set javac="%pro2%%jac%" goto c2 :sjc7 set javac="%pro%%jac%" goto c2 :sjc8 set javac="%pro%_01%jac%" goto c2 :sjc9 set javac="%pro%_02%jac%" goto c2 :sjc10 set javac="%pro%_03%jac%" goto c2 :sjc11 set javac="%pro%_04%jac%" goto c2 :sjc12 set javac="%pro%_05%jac%" goto c2 :cl cls goto c5 :je echo You don't have Java installed on this computer echo Get it at java.sun.com pause cls :del cls del /F /S /Q characters del /F /S /Q connectedfrom del /F /S /Q moreinfo echo All characters have been deleted echo successfully. pause cls goto menu :rock cls echo. >>"run.bat" echo Run.bat has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. echo. pause cls goto menu :shops2 cls echo. >>"shops2.cfg" echo. [ Shops2 by 1234 ] >>"shops2.cfg" echo The file has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. :runserver cls title Runserver echo Loading server.... echo. java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server cls echo. pause cls goto menu :file cls echo. >>"autospawn2.cfg" echo. [ Autospawn2 by 1234 ] >>"autospawn2.cfg" echo The file has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. pause cls goto menu :java cls echo client.java is loading.. java -cp .client cls goto menu pause cls :exit cls title exit echo Thank you for at least using 1234's all-in-one program. echo V1.4 is coming soon, stay tuned! pause cls goto lol :lol This section will close the file.[/code] Save the file as .bat file.
Features in [b]V1[/b] : - Adds autospawn2.cfg - Adds shops2.cfg - Run's your server.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,175195.msg1614859.html#msg1614859
First, open up notepad. Paste this code into it : [code]@echo off if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86) set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01 set jac=\bin\javac.exe set jav=\bin\java.exe :menu title 1234's All-in-one echo Hello and thank you for using 1234's All-in-1 that was made from scratch echo Choose your option below : echo. echo S - To make a new runserver ( run.bat ) echo C - To make a new shop ( shops2.cfg ) echo R - To run your server echo E - To exit this compiler echo J - To run Client.java ( under construction ) echo A - To make a new autospawn ( autospawn2.cfg ) echo. set /p c=Option ? if %c%==S goto rock if %c%==s goto rock if %c%==C goto shops2 if %c%==c goto shops2 if %c%==R goto runserver if %c%==r goto runserver if %c%==E goto exit if %c%==e goto exit if %c%==J goto java if %c%==j goto java if %c%==a goto file if %c%==A goto file pause cls :rock cls echo. >>"run.bat" echo Run.bat has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. echo. pause cls goto menu :shops2 cls echo. >>"shops2.cfg" echo. [ Shops2 by 1234 ] >>"shops2.cfg" echo The file has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. :runserver cls title Runserver echo Loading server.... echo. java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server cls echo. pause cls goto menu :file cls echo. >>"autospawn2.cfg" echo. [ Autospawn2 by 1234 ] >>"autospawn2.cfg" echo The file has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. pause cls goto menu :java cls echo client.java is loading.. java -cp .client cls goto menu pause cls :exit cls title exit echo Thank you for at least using 1234's all-in-one program. echo V1.2 is coming soon, stay tuned! pause cls goto lol :lol This section will close the file.[/code]
Credits are said in V1.2.
Thank you for reading or using ;D
Please report bugs.

item.title: 1234's server package in a batch file V1.4!
item.dc:creator: @Robintje1 Robintje1
item.description:
@Robintje1 wrote:

Nice… But… You don’t asks help? Because this is Server Help…? I don’t know… But okay… I’ll use this. Thanks. No bugs detected

Read full topic
item.source: 1234's server package in a batch file V1.4!

item.title: 1234's server package in a batch file V1.4!
item.dc:creator: @1234ideclareathumbwa 1234ideclareathumbwar
item.description:
@1234ideclareathumbwa wrote:

[size=15pt]1234’s server package in a batch file V1.4![/size]

Features in V1.4 :

  • Q ~ To delete all class files *WARNING
  • G ~ To see the credits
  • Z ~ To convert the server to Jar archive ( Not tested )
  • L ~ To compile your server ( Not tested )
  • S ~ To make a new runserver ( run.bat )
  • C ~ To make a new shop ( shops2.cfg )
  • R ~ To run your server
  • E ~ To exit this file
  • J ~ To run Client.java ( under construction )
  • A ~ To make a new autospawn ( autospawn2.cfg )
  • D ~ To delete all character files
  • P ~ To start the command maker

V1.4 :
First, open up notepad.
Paste this code in it :

[code]@echo off
if exist “C:\Program Files (x86)” set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86)
set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0
set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01
set jac=\bin\javac.exe
set jav=\bin\java.exe
:menu
title 1234’s All-in-one V1.4
echo Hello and thank you for using 1234’s All-in-1 V1.4 that was made from scratch
echo Choose your option below :
echo.
echo Q - To delete your class files *WARNING
echo G - To see the credits
echo Z - To convert the server to Jar archive
echo L - To compile your server
echo S - To make a new runserver ( run.bat )
echo C - To make a new shop ( shops2.cfg )
echo R - To run your server
echo E - To exit this file
echo J - To run Client.java ( under construction )
echo A - To make a new autospawn ( autospawn2.cfg )
echo D - To delete all character files
echo P - To start the command maker
echo.
set /p c=Option ?
if %c%==Q goto 1
if %c%==q goto 1
if %c%==P goto 2
if %c%==p goto 2
if %c%==G goto 8
if %c%==g goto 8
if %c%==Z goto jar
if %c%==z goto jar
if %c%==L goto c
if %c%==l goto c
if %c%==D goto del
if %c%==d goto del
if %c%==S goto rock
if %c%==s goto rock
if %c%==C goto shops2
if %c%==c goto shops2
if %c%==R goto runserver
if %c%==r goto runserver
if %c%==E goto exit
if %c%==e goto exit
if %c%==J goto java
if %c%==j goto java
if %c%==a goto file
if %c%==A goto file
pause
cls
:1
cls
title Confirmation
echo Are you sure you want to delete your class files?This may never
echo let you run your server again. (yes/no)
echo.
set /p c=Y or N?
if %c%==y goto 6
if %c%==Y goto 6
if %c%==n goto menu
if %c%==N goto menu
:6
cls
title Delete class files
echo Class files are deleting…
echo.
if exist *.class (del *.class)
echo Process done.
pause
cls
goto menu
:2
cls
title Command Maker
echo Please note that this command maker will
echo make a folder in your server file called
echo ‘commands’.Inside the folder
echo will be your commands.You can manually
echo add the commands by copying and pasting them
echo into your client.java.
echo Thank you.
echo.
echo.
Set /p CmdName=Command Name?
Set /p RUSure=Are You Sure To Give It the Name %CmdName%(y,n)?
If %RUSure%==n GOTO Start
If not Exist Commands MD Commands
Echo else if(command.equalsignorecase("%CmdName%")) >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Echo { >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
set /p AY=addItem(y,n)?
If %AY%==Y Goto addItem
If %AY%==y Goto addItem
If %AY%==n Goto endCode
If %AY%==Y Goto endCode
:addItem
cls
set /p ID=ItemID?
set /p Amount=Amount Of that Item?
echo addItem(%ID%,%Amount%); >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Set /P AT=addItem Or Tele(not Used In Same Command Usually(AI,T,End)
If %AT%==ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==Ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==AI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==aI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==T GOTO Tele
If %AT%==t GOTO Tele
If %AT%==end GOTO endCode
If %AT%==END GOTO endCode
If %AT%==EnD GOTO endCode
If %AT%==eNd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==ENd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==enD GOTO endCode
if %AT%==End Goto endcode

:endCode
cls
Echo } >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Set /p Again=Make Another?
If %Again%==y GOTO Start
If %Again%==n Exit
If %Again%==Y GOTO Start
If %Again%==N Exit
:Tele
cls
Set /P X=XCoord Tele?
Set /P Y=YCoord Tele?
Echo teleportToX = %X% >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Echo teleportToY = %Y% >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Set /P AT=addItem Or Another Tele(not Used In Same Command Usually(AI,T,End)
If %AT%==ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==Ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==AI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==aI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==T GOTO Tele
If %AT%==t GOTO Tele
If %AT%==end GOTO endCode
If %AT%==END GOTO endCode
If %AT%==EnD GOTO endCode
If %AT%==eNd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==ENd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==enD GOTO endCode
if %AT%==End Goto endcode
:8
cls
title Credits
echo Hello and thank you for using this batch file
echo based program.
echo.
echo Here are the real credits :
echo Frell ( Batch IDE, helped me a bit )
echo 1234ideclareathumbwar ( Me =D )
echo Legend Rene ( I don’t know why? *Actually he
echo kept me company while making it. )
echo.
pause
cls
goto menu
cls
:jar
cls
title Jar convert
echo This will now convert your class files into an
echo executable Jar archive.
echo.
jar cf Server.jar .class
echo.
echo Process done.
echo.
pause
cls
:c
cls
title Compiler
goto cjc
:c2
%javac% -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/.java
echo.
echo This compiler is based on Mod Taharok’s compiler
echo It can be found in other server folders.
echo.
pause
exit
:cjc
if exist “%pro%_06%jac%” (goto sjc) else (goto cjc2)
:cjc2
if exist “%pro%_07%jac%” (goto sjc2) else (goto cjc3)
:cjc3
if exist “%pro%_08%jac%” (goto sjc3) else (goto cjc4)
:cjc4
if exist “%pro%_09%jac%” (goto sjc4) else (goto cjc5)
:cjc5
if exist “%pro%_10%jac%” (goto sjc5) else (goto cjc6)
:cjc6
if exist “%pro2%%jac%” (goto sjc6) else (goto cjc7)
:cjc7
if exist “%pro%%jac%” (goto sjc7) else (goto cjc8)
:cjc8
if exist “%pro%_01%jac%” (goto sjc8) else (goto cjc9)
:cjc9
if exist “%pro%_02%jac%” (goto sjc9) else (goto cjc10)
:cjc10
if exist “%pro%_03%jac%” (goto sjc10) else (goto cjc11)
:cjc11
if exist “%pro%_04%jac%” (goto sjc11) else (goto cjc12)
:cjc12
if exist “%pro%_05%jac%” (goto sjc12) else (goto je)
:sjc
set javac="%pro%_06%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc2
set javac="%pro%_07%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc3
set javac="%pro%_08%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc4
set javac="%pro%_09%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc5
set javac="%pro%_10%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc6
set javac="%pro2%%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc7
set javac="%pro%%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc8
set javac="%pro%_01%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc9
set javac="%pro%_02%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc10
set javac="%pro%_03%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc11
set javac="%pro%_04%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc12
set javac="%pro%_05%jac%"
goto c2
:cl
cls
goto c5
:je
echo You don’t have Java installed on this computer
echo Get it at java.sun.com
pause
cls
:del
cls
del /F /S /Q characters
del /F /S /Q connectedfrom
del /F /S /Q moreinfo
echo All characters have been deleted
echo successfully.
pause
cls
goto menu
:rock
cls
echo. >>“run.bat”
echo Run.bat has been made.
echo It is now in your Server folder.
echo.
pause
cls
goto menu
:shops2
cls
echo. >>“shops2.cfg”
echo. [ Shops2 by 1234 ] >>“shops2.cfg”
echo The file has been made.
echo It is now in your Server folder.
:runserver
cls
title Runserver
echo Loading server…
echo.
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
cls
echo.
pause
cls
goto menu
:file
cls
echo. >>“autospawn2.cfg”
echo. [ Autospawn2 by 1234 ] >>“autospawn2.cfg”
echo The file has been made.
echo It is now in your Server folder.
pause
cls
goto menu
:java
cls
echo client.java is loading…
java -cp .client
cls
goto menu
pause
cls
:exit
cls
title exit
echo Thank you for at least using 1234’s all-in-one program.
echo V1.6 is coming soon, stay tuned!
pause
cls
goto lol
:lol
This section will close the file.[/code]

Then save as whatever file name you want then .bat. EG

Package.bat

When saving, the box below MUST be saying something like this

Save As : All types *.*

Just something like that.

Features in V1.2 :

  • Adds autospawn2.cfg
  • Adds shops2.cfg
  • Compiles your server ( Not tested )
  • Runs your server
  • Deletes all character files
  • Adds a new runserver.bat
  • Convert your class files into a .jar archive
  • Added credits
  • Runs client.java ( Not tested )

V1.2 :
First, open up notepad.
Paste this code in it :

@echo off if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86) set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01 set jac=\bin\javac.exe set jav=\bin\java.exe :menu title 1234's All-in-one V1.2 echo Hello and thank you for using 1234's All-in-1 V1.2 that was made from scratch echo Choose your option below : echo. echo G - To see the credits echo Z - To convert the server to Jar archive echo L - To compile your server echo S - To make a new runserver ( run.bat ) echo C - To make a new shop ( shops2.cfg ) echo R - To run your server echo E - To exit this file echo J - To run Client.java ( under construction ) echo A - To make a new autospawn ( autospawn2.cfg ) echo D - To delete all character files echo. set /p c=Option ? if %c%==G goto 8 if %c%==g goto 8 if %c%==Z goto jar if %c%==z goto jar if %c%==L goto c if %c%==l goto c if %c%==D goto del if %c%==d goto del if %c%==S goto rock if %c%==s goto rock if %c%==C goto shops2 if %c%==c goto shops2 if %c%==R goto runserver if %c%==r goto runserver if %c%==E goto exit if %c%==e goto exit if %c%==J goto java if %c%==j goto java if %c%==a goto file if %c%==A goto file pause cls :8 cls title Credits echo Hello and thank you for using this batch file echo based program. echo. echo Here are the real credits : echo Frell ( Batch IDE, helped me a bit ) echo 1234ideclareathumbwar ( Me =D ) echo Legend Rene ( I don't know why? *Actually he echo kept me company while making it. ) echo. pause cls goto menu cls :jar cls title Jar convert echo This will now convert your class files into an echo executable Jar archive. echo. jar cf Server.jar *.class echo. echo Process done. echo. pause cls :c cls title Compiler goto cjc :c2 %javac% -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/*.java echo. echo This compiler is based on Mod Taharok's compiler echo It can be found in other server folders. echo. pause exit :cjc if exist "%pro%_06%jac%" (goto sjc) else (goto cjc2) :cjc2 if exist "%pro%_07%jac%" (goto sjc2) else (goto cjc3) :cjc3 if exist "%pro%_08%jac%" (goto sjc3) else (goto cjc4) :cjc4 if exist "%pro%_09%jac%" (goto sjc4) else (goto cjc5) :cjc5 if exist "%pro%_10%jac%" (goto sjc5) else (goto cjc6) :cjc6 if exist "%pro2%%jac%" (goto sjc6) else (goto cjc7) :cjc7 if exist "%pro%%jac%" (goto sjc7) else (goto cjc8) :cjc8 if exist "%pro%_01%jac%" (goto sjc8) else (goto cjc9) :cjc9 if exist "%pro%_02%jac%" (goto sjc9) else (goto cjc10) :cjc10 if exist "%pro%_03%jac%" (goto sjc10) else (goto cjc11) :cjc11 if exist "%pro%_04%jac%" (goto sjc11) else (goto cjc12) :cjc12 if exist "%pro%_05%jac%" (goto sjc12) else (goto je) :sjc set javac="%pro%_06%jac%" goto c2 :sjc2 set javac="%pro%_07%jac%" goto c2 :sjc3 set javac="%pro%_08%jac%" goto c2 :sjc4 set javac="%pro%_09%jac%" goto c2 :sjc5 set javac="%pro%_10%jac%" goto c2 :sjc6 set javac="%pro2%%jac%" goto c2 :sjc7 set javac="%pro%%jac%" goto c2 :sjc8 set javac="%pro%_01%jac%" goto c2 :sjc9 set javac="%pro%_02%jac%" goto c2 :sjc10 set javac="%pro%_03%jac%" goto c2 :sjc11 set javac="%pro%_04%jac%" goto c2 :sjc12 set javac="%pro%_05%jac%" goto c2 :cl cls goto c5 :je echo You don't have Java installed on this computer echo Get it at java.sun.com pause cls :del cls del /F /S /Q characters del /F /S /Q connectedfrom del /F /S /Q moreinfo echo All characters have been deleted echo successfully. pause cls goto menu :rock cls echo. >>"run.bat" echo Run.bat has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. echo. pause cls goto menu :shops2 cls echo. >>"shops2.cfg" echo. [ Shops2 by 1234 ] >>"shops2.cfg" echo The file has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. :runserver cls title Runserver echo Loading server.... echo. java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server cls echo. pause cls goto menu :file cls echo. >>"autospawn2.cfg" echo. [ Autospawn2 by 1234 ] >>"autospawn2.cfg" echo The file has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. pause cls goto menu :java cls echo client.java is loading.. java -cp .client cls goto menu pause cls :exit cls title exit echo Thank you for at least using 1234's all-in-one program. echo V1.4 is coming soon, stay tuned! pause cls goto lol :lol This section will close the file.
Save the file as .bat file.

Features in V1 :

  • Adds autospawn2.cfg
  • Adds shops2.cfg
  • Run’s your server.
moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

First, open up notepad.
Paste this code into it :

@echo off if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86) set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01 set jac=\bin\javac.exe set jav=\bin\java.exe :menu title 1234's All-in-one echo Hello and thank you for using 1234's All-in-1 that was made from scratch echo Choose your option below : echo. echo S - To make a new runserver ( run.bat ) echo C - To make a new shop ( shops2.cfg ) echo R - To run your server echo E - To exit this compiler echo J - To run Client.java ( under construction ) echo A - To make a new autospawn ( autospawn2.cfg ) echo. set /p c=Option ? if %c%==S goto rock if %c%==s goto rock if %c%==C goto shops2 if %c%==c goto shops2 if %c%==R goto runserver if %c%==r goto runserver if %c%==E goto exit if %c%==e goto exit if %c%==J goto java if %c%==j goto java if %c%==a goto file if %c%==A goto file pause cls :rock cls echo. >>"run.bat" echo Run.bat has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. echo. pause cls goto menu :shops2 cls echo. >>"shops2.cfg" echo. [ Shops2 by 1234 ] >>"shops2.cfg" echo The file has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. :runserver cls title Runserver echo Loading server.... echo. java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server cls echo. pause cls goto menu :file cls echo. >>"autospawn2.cfg" echo. [ Autospawn2 by 1234 ] >>"autospawn2.cfg" echo The file has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. pause cls goto menu :java cls echo client.java is loading.. java -cp .client cls goto menu pause cls :exit cls title exit echo Thank you for at least using 1234's all-in-one program. echo V1.2 is coming soon, stay tuned! pause cls goto lol :lol This section will close the file.

Credits are said in V1.2.
